items.sentence: Please remember everything that I've told you tonight.
It's considered impolite to chew with your mouth open.
It makes no difference to me whether Tom comes or not.
Tom adamantly denied that he was the one who did that.
French and English are the only two languages I speak.
Do you remember what happened here in October of 2013?
In the kingdom of the blind, the one eyed-man is king.
A journey of thousand miles begins with a single step.
Tom asked Mary if he could borrow her magnifying glass
Tom's brazen act of defiance almost cost him his life.
Please give me some kind of medicine to curb the pain.
Mary has a bad back. It's hard for her to lift things.
Have you ever asked yourself why Tom might think that?
Even my husband doesn't know what I'm really thinking.
I can't believe Tom just left without saying anything.
Many people have told me they think that I'm handsome.
Tom didn't think it was likely Mary was still at home.
I don't think that I have the energy to walk that far.
Don't you think that it's strange that Tom isn't here?
Do you think anybody would care if Tom didn't do that?
